attributes.action: Imprison racists for using Brexit as an excuse for open racism
attributes.additional_details:
Below are just some examples of the abuse on our streets today:

attributes.background:
As a result of Brexit, some UK residents have decided that this means it is ok to be openly racist and ask any non whites to leave the country and go home.

Like the rioters of 2011, swift and decisive action is needed to bring law and order back to the UK before riots return to our streets.

rejection.details: Decisions about whether people should go to prison are taken by the courts, not the Government or Parliament.
